DEVELOPER: Senior Fullstack Developer | Angular | Ionic | Node.js | Tech Lead
ABOUT_DESC: Tech Lead and Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience in the design, evolution, and modernization of critical web and mobile applications for multiple companies and thousands of users. Expert in Angular (JS and 2+ up to v20), React, Node.js, PHP, Ionic, Cloud (Azure and Cloudflare R2), and CI/CD, with a proven track record in technology migrations, legacy system modernization, and deployment automation. Leadership of technical teams, architecture definition, demand prioritization, and coordination with DevOps, QA, and support, ensuring high availability (>95%) and reduction of recurring incidents (50%) in production. Results-oriented, with a focus on code quality, operational efficiency, and continuous improvement.
ABOUT_EDUCATION: Education and Languages: Systems Analyst degree completed in 2020, with a GPA of 8/10. Native Spanish, advanced Portuguese with professional technical usage, and basic English.
